			this = cu:naga
		}
		localization_key = RU_CUL_ADJ_naga
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = cu:deccani
		}
		localization_key = RU_CUL_ADJ_deccani
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = cu:pathan
		}
		localization_key = RU_CUL_ADJ_pathan
	}
#	text = {  
#		trigger = {
#			this = cu:malay_culture
#		}
#		localization_key = RU_CUL_ADJ_malay_culture
#	}
	text = {
		localization_key = RU_CUL_ADJ_DEFAULT
	}
}

### COUNTRIES | СТРАНЫ ###
RU_CL_END = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no
	
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = root
			root = {
				is_secessionist = no
				var:civil_war_type_var ?= movement_type:movement_anti_slavery
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_OE # ое
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = root
			root = {
				is_secessionist = no
				var:civil_war_type_var ?= movement_type:movement_pro_slavery
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_OE # ое

					exists = c:HRE
					this = c:HRE
					c:HRE = {
						OR = {
							has_law = law_type:law_parliamentary_republic
							has_law = law_type:law_presidential_republic
						}
						has_law = law_type:law_technocracy
					}
				}
				any_diplomatic_play = {
					initiator = root										
					exists = c:HRE										
					target = {
						this = c:HRE
						c:HRE = {
							OR = {
								has_law = law_type:law_parliamentary_republic
								has_law = law_type:law_presidential_republic
							}
							has_law = law_type:law_technocracy
						}
					}
					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_IY # ий
	}

							any_scope_state = {
								NOT = { has_state_trait = state_trait_andes }
								percent > 0.4
							}
							any_scope_state = {
								is_incorporated = yes
								OR = {
									state_is_in_north_america = yes
									state_is_in_central_america = yes
								}
								count > 1
							}
						}
					}
				}
				any_diplomatic_play = {
					initiator = root										
					exists = c:FND										
					target = {
						this = c:FND

									}

								is_subject_of = c:MOL
							}

				any_diplomatic_play = {
					initiator = root										
					exists = c:CAL										
					target = {
						this = c:CAL
						c:CAL = {
							owns_entire_state_region = STATE_CALIFORNIA
							owns_entire_state_region = STATE_BAJA_CALIFORNIA
						}			
					}
					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_IE # и
	}

								this = c:AZB								
								coa_dictatorship_trigger = yes						
								OR = {	
									AND = {
										exists = c:GBR						
										c:GBR = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
										coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes				
									}
									AND = {
										exists = c:ENG						
										c:ENG = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
										coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes				
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_YA # а
	}

								state_region = { has_variable = district_of_columbia }
								count > 0								
							}
							any_scope_state = {
								state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
								count < 1								
							}
						}
					}

								exists = c:USA

										has_diplomatic_pact = {	
											who = scope:actor					
											type = dominion					
											is_initiator = yes			
										}
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:HBC

										is_subject_of = c:HBC						
									}
								}

									exists = c:CAN							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:CAN						
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

								AND = {
									exists = c:GBR

										has_diplomatic_pact = {	
											who = scope:actor					
											type = dominion					
											is_initiator = yes			
										}
									}
								}

									exists = c:HBC							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:HBC						
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:CAN							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:CAN						
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}

										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}

						OR = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:GBR								
								c:GBR = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
								coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes						
							}
							AND = {
								exists = c:ENG								
								c:ENG = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
								coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes						
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						target = {	
							AND = {
								exists = c:MKT								
								this = c:MKT								
								coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = yes						
								OR = {	
									AND = {
										exists = c:GBR						
										c:GBR = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
										coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes				
									}
									AND = {
										exists = c:ENG						
										c:ENG = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
										coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes				
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_OE # о
	}

					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution

					}
				}
			}
		}

RU_CL_END_FEM = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = root
			root = {

							has_law = law_type:law_technocracy
						}
					}
					OR = {

						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}
				}
			}
		}

						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_BAJA_CALIFORNIA
					}					
				}
				any_diplomatic_play = {
					initiator = root										
					exists = c:CAL										
					target = {
						this = c:CAL
						c:CAL = {
							owns_entire_state_region = STATE_CALIFORNIA
							owns_entire_state_region = STATE_BAJA_CALIFORNIA
						}			
					}
					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_FEM_I

								capital = { state_region = s:STATE_PATAGONIA }
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_FEM_A # а

						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						target = {	
							AND = {
								exists = c:USA								
								this = c:USA								
								c:USA = {
									any_scope_state = {
										state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
										count = 1						
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_FEM_Y # й
	}

								AND = {

									c:GBR = {
										has_diplomatic_pact = {	
											who = scope:actor					
											type = dominion					
											is_initiator = yes			
										}
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:HBC

									}
								}

									exists = c:CAN

										is_subject_of = c:CAN						
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

								AND = {
									exists = c:GBR

										}
									}
								}

										is_subject_of = c:HBC						
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:CAN							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:CAN						
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}

				AND = {
					exists = c:PBC
					this = c:PBC
				}
				any_diplomatic_play = {
					initiator = root										
					exists = c:PBC										
					target = c:PBC										
					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}
				}
			}
		}

RU_CL_END_T = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = root
			root = {
				is_secessionist = no
				is_revolutionary = yes
				ig:ig_devout = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = root
			root = {
				is_secessionist = no
				is_revolutionary = yes
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET
	}

							}
						}

				OR = {
					AND = {
					exists = c:ENG
					this = c:ENG
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						exists = c:ENG										
						target = c:ENG										
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET # ет
	}
	text = { # а

								NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
								exists = capital

							}
							c:GBR = { coa_dictatorship_trigger = yes }

								exists = c:CAM								
								this = c:CAM								
								coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = yes						
								NOT = { is_country_type = unrecognized }
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET # ет
	}

		trigger = {	
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:USA										
						this = c:USA										
						c:USA = {	
							any_scope_state = {
								state_region = { has_variable = district_of_columbia }
								count > 0								
							}
							any_scope_state = {
								state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
								count < 1								
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						target = {	
							AND = {
								exists = c:USA								
								this = c:USA								
								c:USA = {
									any_scope_state = {
										state_region = { has_variable = district_of_columbia }
										count > 0						
									}
									any_scope_state = {
										state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
										count < 1						
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}

						c:ORG = {	
							NOR = {
								AND = {
									exists = c:GBR							
									c:GBR = {
										has_diplomatic_pact = {	
											who = scope:actor					
											type = dominion					
											is_initiator = yes			
										}
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:HBC							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:HBC						
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:CAN							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:CAN						
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						exists = c:ORG										
						target = c:ORG										
						c:ORG = {	
							NOR = {
								AND = {
									exists = c:GBR							
									c:GBR = {
										has_diplomatic_pact = {	
											who = scope:actor					
											type = dominion					
											is_initiator = yes			
										}
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:HBC							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:HBC						
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:CAN							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:CAN						
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}

							AND = {
								exists = c:HAI								
								this = c:HAI								
								exists = c:FRA								
								c:FRA = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
								coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes						
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET # ет

			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:YUZ
					this = c:YUZ
				}
				any_diplomatic_play = {
					initiator = root										
					exists = c:YUZ										
					target = c:YUZ										
					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET # й

	}
	text = {
		trigger = {

				}
				NOR = {
					any_scope_state = {
						region = sr:region_bengal

	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = root
			root = {
				is_secessionist = no
				is_revolutionary = yes
				ig:ig_devout = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_GE
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = root
			root = {
				is_secessionist = no
				is_revolutionary = yes
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_GE
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = root
			root = {

					initiator = root										
					exists = c:PLC										
					target = {
						this = c:PLC
						c:PLC = { has_variable = greater_commonwealth_var }
					}
					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}
				}
			}
		}

								is_subject_of = c:MOL
							}

		trigger = {	
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:ONT										
						this = c:ONT
						exists = c:GBR										
						c:GBR = {	
							has_diplomatic_pact = {
								who = c:ONT								
								type = puppet								
								is_initiator = yes						
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						target = {	
							AND = {
								exists = c:ONT								
								this = c:ONT								
								exists = c:GBR								
								c:GBR = {
									has_diplomatic_pact = {
										who = c:ONT						
										type = puppet						
										is_initiator = yes				
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_GE # же

										c:GBR = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
										coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes				
									}
									AND = {
										exists = c:ENG						
										c:ENG = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
										coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes				
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_GE # же
	}
	text = { # а
		trigger = {	
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:ORG										
						this = c:ORG										
						OR = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:GBR								
								c:GBR = {
									has_diplomatic_pact = {
										who = scope:actor						
										type = dominion						
										is_initiator = yes				
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								exists = c:HBC								
								scope:actor = {	
									is_subject_of = c:HBC							
								}
							}
							AND = {
								exists = c:CAN								
								scope:actor = {	
									is_subject_of = c:CAN							
								}
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						target = {	
							AND = {
								exists = c:ORG								
								this = c:ORG								
								OR = {
									AND = {
										exists = c:GBR

										}

										}

							coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes							
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_GU # гу

		}

RU_CL_END_UT = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = root
			root = {
				is_secessionist = no
				is_revolutionary = yes
				ig:ig_devout = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = root
			root = {
				is_secessionist = no
				is_revolutionary = yes
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {

								NOT = { has_state_trait = state_trait_andes }
								percent > 0.4
							}
							any_scope_state = {
								is_incorporated = yes
								OR = {
									state_is_in_north_america = yes
									state_is_in_central_america = yes
								}
								count > 1
							}
						}
					}
				}
				any_diplomatic_play = {
					initiator = root										
					exists = c:FND										
					target = {
						this = c:FND

					target = {
						this = c:FRA
						c:FRA = {
							has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
							OR = {
								has_variable = orleanist_restoration_var
								has_variable = legitimist_restoration_var
							}
							has_variable = one_true_french_dynasty
						}
					}
					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET # о

							exists = c:WAL
							this = c:WAL
						}
					}
					coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = yes
					OR = {
						c:MOL = {
							has_variable = ROM_united_principality
						}

							has_variable = ROM_united_principality
						}
					}
				}

						OR = {
							this = c:WAL
							this = c:MOL
						}
						coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = no
						OR = {
							c:MOL = {
								has_variable = ROM_united_principality
							}
							c:WAL ?= {
								is_subject_of = c:MOL
							}
						}
					}
					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}

					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						exists = c:ITA										
						target = c:ITA										
						NOT = {	
							c:ITA = {
								has_law = law_type:law_theocracy								
								NOT = { exists = c:PAP }
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET # ет
	}

						this = c:USA										
						coa_def_theocracy_flag_trigger = yes								
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						target = {	
							AND = {
								exists = c:USA								
								this = c:USA								
								coa_def_theocracy_flag_trigger = yes						
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_YT # ут
	}

						this = c:ORG
						c:ORG = {	
							NOR = {
								AND = {
									exists = c:GBR							
									c:GBR = {
										has_diplomatic_pact = {	
											who = scope:actor					
											type = dominion					
											is_initiator = yes			
										}
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:HBC							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:HBC						
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:CAN							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:CAN						
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						exists = c:ORG										
						target = c:ORG										
						c:ORG = {	
							NOR = {
								AND = {
									exists = c:GBR							
									c:GBR = {
										has_diplomatic_pact = {	
											who = scope:actor					
											type = dominion					
											is_initiator = yes			
										}
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:HBC							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:HBC						
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:CAN							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:CAN						
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET # ет
	}

							}

						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_EAST_BORNEO

								OR = {
									AND = {

									}			
								}

							}
						}

							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}

									is_capital = yes					
									region = sr:region_north_africa							
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET # ет
	}
	text = { # о

		trigger = {
			exists = root

### BUILDINGS | СООРУЖЕНИЯ ###
## GENITIVE | РОДИТЕЛЬНЫЙ ##
RU_BL_RP = {
	type = building
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_company_regional_headquarter
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_building_company_regional_headquarter
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_food_industry
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_food_industry
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_textile_mills
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_textile_mills
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_furniture_manufacturies
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_furniture_manufacturies
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_glassworks
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_glassworks
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_tooling_workshops
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_tooling_workshops
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_paper_mills
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_paper_mills
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_chemical_plants
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_chemical_plants
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_synthetics_plants
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_synthetics_plants
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_steel_mills
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_steel_mills
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_motor_industry
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_motor_industry
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_shipyards
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_shipyards
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_automotive_industry
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_automotive_industry

### MARKET | ПРИЛАГАТЕЛЬНЫЕ РЫНКОВ ###
RU_ML_ADJ = {
	type = market
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:ABK
			this = c:ABK
			}
		}
		localization_key = ABK_RU_ML_ADJ # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:MAZ

RU_CL_RANG_RP = {
	type = country
	random_valid = no
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank >= rank_value:great_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_RP_great_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:major_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_RP_major_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:minor_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_RP_minor_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:insignificant_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_RP_insignificant_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:unrecognized_major_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_RP_unrecognized_major_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:unrecognized_regional_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_RP_unrecognized_regional_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:unrecognized_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_RP_unrecognized_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:decentralized_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_RP_decentralized_power
	}
}
RU_CL_RANG_DP = {
	type = country
	random_valid = no
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank >= rank_value:great_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_DP_great_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:major_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_DP_major_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:minor_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_DP_minor_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:insignificant_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_DP_insignificant_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:unrecognized_major_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_DP_unrecognized_major_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:unrecognized_regional_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_DP_unrecognized_regional_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:unrecognized_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_DP_unrecognized_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:decentralized_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_DP_decentralized_power
	}
}

	type = country
	random_valid = no
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank >= rank_value:great_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_TP_great_power

	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:major_power
		}

	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:minor_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_TP_minor_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:insignificant_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_TP_insignificant_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:unrecognized_major_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_TP_unrecognized_major_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:unrecognized_regional_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_TP_unrecognized_regional_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:unrecognized_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_TP_unrecognized_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:decentralized_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_TP_decentralized_power
	}
}
RU_CL_RANG_PP = {
	type = country
	random_valid = no
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank >= rank_value:great_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_PP_great_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:major_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_PP_major_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:minor_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_PP_minor_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:insignificant_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_PP_insignificant_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:unrecognized_major_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_PP_unrecognized_major_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:unrecognized_regional_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_PP_unrecognized_regional_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:unrecognized_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_PP_unrecognized_power
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			country_rank = rank_value:decentralized_power
		}
		localization_key = RANG_PP_decentralized_power
	}
}

	type = state
	log_loc_errors = no
	text = {
		trigger = {
			this = { state_region = s:STATE_URMIA }
		}
		localization_key = RU_SL_VP_STATE_URMIA
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			this = { state_region = s:STATE_QUETTA }
		}
		localization_key = RU_SL_VP_STATE_QUETTA
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			this = { state_region = s:STATE_COURLAND }
		}
		localization_key = RU_SL_VP_STATE_COURLAND
	}
	text = {

	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			this = { state_region = s:STATE_OAXACA }
		}
		localization_key = RU_SL_ADJ_STATE_OAXACA
	}
	text = {

		}

		localization_key = RU_SL_ADJ_STATE_RUHR

		trigger = {
			this = { state_region = s:STATE_MAINE_ANJOU }
		}
		localization_key = RU_SL_ADJ_STATE_MAINE_ANJOU
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = RU_SL_DEFAULT_ADJ #
	}
}
### INTEREST GROUP | ЗАИНТЕРЕСОВАННЫЕ ГРУППЫ ###
## ПАДЕЖИ ##
RU_IG_RP = {
	type = interest_group
	log_loc_errors = no
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_landowners
			owner = {
				NOR = {
					AND = {
						c:ZAN ?= this
						any_primary_culture = { cu:bedouin = this }
						NOT = { any_primary_culture = { cu:swahili = this } }
					}
					any_primary_culture = {
						OR = {
							cu:polish = this
							cu:lithuanian = this
							cu:hungarian = this
						}
					}
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:romanian
					c:TUR ?= this
					c:PRU ?= this
					c:GER ?= this
					c:NGF ?= this
					c:RUS ?= this
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:GBR ?= this
					c:KOR ?= this
					c:CHI ?= this
					c:JAP ?= this
					c:AUS ?= this
					OR = {
						c:BIC ?= this
						any_primary_culture = {
							has_discrimination_trait_group = heritage_group_south_asian
						}
					}
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:hawaiian
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:australian
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
					OR = {
						AND = {
							c:USA ?= this
							NOT = { exists = c:CSA }
						}
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_landowners_RU_IG_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_intelligentsia

				NOR = {
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:hawaiian

						c:BIC ?= this

						}

					}

						}

							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_proletarian

							has_discrimination_trait_group = heritage_group_south_asian
							has_discrimination_trait = tradition_himalayan
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_yeoman_farmers_RU_IG_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_rural_folk
			owner = {
				country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
				NOR = {
					any_primary_culture = {
						has_discrimination_trait = language_germanophone
					}

					OR = {
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee

				NOR = {

						NOT = { c:ZAN ?= this }

						country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese

					AND = {

						country_has_primary_culture = cu:swedish
					}
					AND = {

						country_has_primary_culture = cu:finnish

					AND = {

						}
					}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_devout
			owner = {
				AND = {
					country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:swedish
				}
				NOR = {
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:ibadi
						NOT = { c:ZAN ?= this }
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:shinto
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:hawaiian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:maori
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:australian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:anglo_canadian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:british
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:irish
							c:NRU ?= this
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:orthodox
					OR = {
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:russian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:byelorussian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:ukrainian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:danish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:korean
							any_primary_culture = {
								has_discrimination_trait = heritage_han
							}
						}
					}
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:TPG ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana					
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_church_of_sweden_RU_IG_RP
	}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_devout

					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana					
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_sunni_madrasahs_RU_IG_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_devout
			owner = {
				country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
				NOR = {
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:ibadi
						NOT = { c:ZAN ?= this }
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:shinto
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:hawaiian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:maori
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:australian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:anglo_canadian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:british
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:irish
							c:NRU ?= this
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:orthodox
					OR = {
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:russian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:byelorussian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:ukrainian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:danish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:swedish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:finnish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:korean
							any_primary_culture = {
								has_discrimination_trait = heritage_han
							}
						}
					}
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:TPG ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana					
				}

					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:danish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:swedish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:finnish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:korean
							any_primary_culture = {
								has_discrimination_trait = heritage_han
							}
						}
					}
					c:PAP ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana					
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_ibadi_madrasahs_RU_IG_RP
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = ig_default_RU_RP
		fallback = yes
	}
}
RU_IG_DP = {
	type = interest_group
	log_loc_errors = no
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_landowners
			owner = {
				NOR = {
					AND = {
						c:ZAN ?= this
						any_primary_culture = { cu:bedouin = this }
						NOT = { any_primary_culture = { cu:swahili = this } }
					}
					any_primary_culture = {
						OR = {
							cu:polish = this
							cu:lithuanian = this
							cu:hungarian = this
						}
					}
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:romanian
					c:TUR ?= this
					c:PRU ?= this
					c:GER ?= this
					c:NGF ?= this
					c:RUS ?= this
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:GBR ?= this
					c:KOR ?= this
					c:CHI ?= this
					c:JAP ?= this
					c:AUS ?= this
					OR = {
						c:BIC ?= this
						any_primary_culture = {
							has_discrimination_trait_group = heritage_group_south_asian
						}
					}
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:hawaiian
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:australian
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
					OR = {
						AND = {
							c:USA ?= this
							NOT = { exists = c:CSA }
						}
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
					}
				}
			}
		}

			owner = {
				OR = {
					any_primary_culture = {
						has_discrimination_trait_group = heritage_group_south_asian
						has_discrimination_trait = tradition_himalayan
					}
				}
				NOR = {
					any_primary_culture = {
						has_discrimination_trait = language_germanophone
					}
					c:EGY ?= this
					OR = {
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
					}
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:hawaiian
					OR = {
						c:BIC ?= this
						any_primary_culture = {
							has_discrimination_trait_group = heritage_group_south_asian
							NOT = {
								has_discrimination_trait = tradition_himalayan
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_kisanharu_RU_IG_DP
	}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_devout
			owner = {
				AND = {
					country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
				}
				NOR = {
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:ibadi
						NOT = { c:ZAN ?= this }
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:shinto
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:hawaiian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:maori
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:australian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:anglo_canadian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:british
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:irish
							c:NRU ?= this
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:orthodox
					OR = {
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:russian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:byelorussian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:ukrainian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:danish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:swedish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:finnish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:korean
							any_primary_culture = {
								has_discrimination_trait = heritage_han
							}
						}
					}
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:TPG ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_buddhist_monks_RU_IG_DP
	}

					OR = {
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:russian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:byelorussian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:ukrainian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:danish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:swedish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:finnish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:korean
							any_primary_culture = {
								has_discrimination_trait = heritage_han
							}
						}
					}
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:TPG ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa

						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:maori
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:australian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:anglo_canadian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:british
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:irish
							c:NRU ?= this
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:orthodox
					OR = {
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:russian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:byelorussian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:ukrainian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:danish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:swedish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:finnish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:korean
							any_primary_culture = {
								has_discrimination_trait = heritage_han
							}
						}
					}
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:TPG ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana					
				}
			}

					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana					
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_taiping_god_worshippers_RU_IG_DP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_devout
			owner = {
				AND = {
					country_has_state_religion = rel:ibadi
					NOT = { c:ZAN ?= this }
				}
				NOR = {
					c:TPG ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:shinto
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:hawaiian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:maori
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:australian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:anglo_canadian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:british
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:irish
							c:NRU ?= this
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:orthodox
					OR = {
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:russian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:byelorussian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:ukrainian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:danish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:swedish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:finnish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:korean
							any_primary_culture = {
								has_discrimination_trait = heritage_han
							}
						}
					}
					c:PAP ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana					
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_ibadi_madrasahs_RU_IG_DP
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = ig_default_RU_DP
		fallback = yes
	}
}
RU_IG_VP = {
	type = interest_group
	log_loc_errors = no
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_landowners
			owner = {
				NOR = {
					AND = {
						c:ZAN ?= this
						any_primary_culture = { cu:bedouin = this }
						NOT = { any_primary_culture = { cu:swahili = this } }
					}
					any_primary_culture = {
						OR = {
							cu:polish = this
							cu:lithuanian = this
							cu:hungarian = this
						}
					}
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:romanian
					c:TUR ?= this
					c:PRU ?= this
					c:GER ?= this
					c:NGF ?= this
					c:RUS ?= this
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:GBR ?= this
					c:KOR ?= this
					c:CHI ?= this
					c:JAP ?= this
					c:AUS ?= this
					OR = {
						c:BIC ?= this
						any_primary_culture = {
							has_discrimination_trait_group = heritage_group_south_asian
						}
					}
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:hawaiian
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:australian
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
					OR = {
						AND = {
							c:USA ?= this
							NOT = { exists = c:CSA }
						}
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_landowners_RU_IG_VP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_intelligentsia

						is_subject = yes

							has_government_type = gov_chartered_company

					OR = {
						c:BIC ?= this
						any_primary_culture = {
							has_discrimination_trait_group = heritage_group_south_asian
							NOT = {
								has_discrimination_trait = tradition_himalayan
							}
						}
					}
					OR = {
						any_primary_culture = {
							has_discrimination_trait_group = heritage_group_south_asian
							has_discrimination_trait = tradition_himalayan
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_landvolk_RU_IG_VP
	}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_devout
			owner = {
				AND = {
					country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
				}
				NOR = {
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:ibadi
						NOT = { c:ZAN ?= this }
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:shinto
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:hawaiian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:maori
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:australian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:anglo_canadian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:british
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:irish
							c:NRU ?= this
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:orthodox
					OR = {
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:russian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:byelorussian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:ukrainian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:danish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:swedish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:finnish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:korean
							any_primary_culture = {
								has_discrimination_trait = heritage_han
							}
						}
					}
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:TPG ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_buddhist_monks_RU_IG_VP

					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana					
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_church_of_denmark_RU_IG_VP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_devout
			owner = {
				AND = {
					country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
				}
				NOR = {
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:ibadi
						NOT = { c:ZAN ?= this }
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:shinto
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:hawaiian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:maori
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:australian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:anglo_canadian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:british
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:irish
							c:NRU ?= this
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:orthodox
					OR = {
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:russian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:byelorussian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:ukrainian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:danish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:swedish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:finnish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:korean
							any_primary_culture = {
								has_discrimination_trait = heritage_han
							}
						}
					}
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:TPG ?= this

						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant

							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}

								has_discrimination_trait = heritage_han
							}
						}
					}
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:TPG ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana					
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_evangelical_church_RU_IG_VP

							country_has_primary_culture = cu:irish
							c:NRU ?= this
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:orthodox
					OR = {
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:russian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:byelorussian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:ukrainian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:danish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:swedish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:finnish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:korean
							any_primary_culture = {
								has_discrimination_trait = heritage_han
							}
						}
					}
					c:PAP ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana					
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_taiping_god_worshippers_RU_IG_VP

						country_has_primary_culture = cu:swedish
					}
					AND = {

					}

							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana					
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_ibadi_madrasahs_RU_IG_VP
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = ig_default_RU_VP
		fallback = yes
	}

RU_IG_TP = {
	type = interest_group
	log_loc_errors = no
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_landowners
			owner = {
				NOR = {
					AND = {
						c:ZAN ?= this
						any_primary_culture = { cu:bedouin = this }
						NOT = { any_primary_culture = { cu:swahili = this } }
					}
					any_primary_culture = {
						OR = {
							cu:polish = this
							cu:lithuanian = this
							cu:hungarian = this
						}
					}
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:romanian
					c:TUR ?= this
					c:PRU ?= this
					c:GER ?= this
					c:NGF ?= this
					c:RUS ?= this
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:GBR ?= this
					c:KOR ?= this
					c:CHI ?= this
					c:JAP ?= this
					c:AUS ?= this
					OR = {
						c:BIC ?= this
						any_primary_culture = {
							has_discrimination_trait_group = heritage_group_south_asian
						}
					}
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:hawaiian
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:australian
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
					OR = {
						AND = {
							c:USA ?= this
							NOT = { exists = c:CSA }
						}
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_landowners_RU_IG_TP

	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_landowners
			owner = {
				any_primary_culture = {
					OR = {
						cu:polish = this
						cu:lithuanian = this
						cu:hungarian = this
					}
				}
				NOR = {
					AND = {
						c:ZAN ?= this
						any_primary_culture = { cu:bedouin = this }
						NOT = { any_primary_culture = { cu:swahili = this } }
					}
					OR = {
						c:BIC ?= this
						any_primary_culture = {
							has_discrimination_trait_group = heritage_group_south_asian
						}
					}
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:romanian
					c:TUR ?= this
					c:PRU ?= this
					c:NGF ?= this
					c:RUS ?= this
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:GBR ?= this
					c:KOR ?= this
					c:CHI ?= this
					c:JAP ?= this
					c:AUS ?= this
					OR = {
						AND = {
							c:USA ?= this
							NOT = { exists = c:CSA }
						}
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
					}
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:hawaiian
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:australian
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_magnates_RU_IG_TP
	}

							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_proletarian
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_republican

	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_armed_forces

					has_ideology = ideology:ideology_proletarian
				}
				NOR = {
					AND = {

					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:maori
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:australian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:anglo_canadian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:british
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:irish
							c:NRU ?= this
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:orthodox
					OR = {
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:russian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:byelorussian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:ukrainian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:swedish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:finnish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:korean
							any_primary_culture = {
								has_discrimination_trait = heritage_han
							}
						}
					}
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:TPG ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana					
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_church_of_denmark_RU_IG_TP

						NOT = { c:ZAN ?= this }
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:shinto
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:hawaiian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:maori
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:australian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:anglo_canadian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:british
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:irish
							c:NRU ?= this
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:orthodox
					OR = {
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:russian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:byelorussian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:ukrainian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:danish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:swedish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:finnish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:korean
							any_primary_culture = {
								has_discrimination_trait = heritage_han
							}
						}
					}
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:TPG ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana					
				}

						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_mahayana_monks_RU_IG_TP
	}

		localization_key = ig_default_RU_TP
		fallback = yes
	}

RU_IG_PP = {
	type = interest_group
	log_loc_errors = no
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_landowners
			owner = {
				NOR = {
					AND = {
						c:ZAN ?= this
						any_primary_culture = { cu:bedouin = this }
						NOT = { any_primary_culture = { cu:swahili = this } }
					}
					any_primary_culture = {
						OR = {
							cu:polish = this
							cu:lithuanian = this
							cu:hungarian = this
						}
					}
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:romanian
					c:TUR ?= this
					c:PRU ?= this
					c:GER ?= this
					c:NGF ?= this
					c:RUS ?= this
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:GBR ?= this
					c:KOR ?= this
					c:CHI ?= this
					c:JAP ?= this
					c:AUS ?= this
					OR = {
						c:BIC ?= this
						any_primary_culture = {
							has_discrimination_trait_group = heritage_group_south_asian
						}
					}
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:hawaiian
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:australian
					country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
					OR = {
						AND = {
							c:USA ?= this
							NOT = { exists = c:CSA }
						}
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_landowners_RU_IG_PP
	}

				NOR = {
					c:PRC ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
						NOT = { has_global_variable = fall_of_the_samurai_global_var }
					}
					AND = {
						c:FRA ?= this
						ig:ig_armed_forces = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_proletarian
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_republican
						}
					}
					ig:ig_armed_forces = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_proletarian
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_indian_army_RU_IG_PP
	}

				NOR = {
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:ibadi
						NOT = { c:ZAN ?= this }

						country_has_state_religion = rel:shinto

					}
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:TPG ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana					
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_orthodox_church_RU_IG_PP
	}

						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:swedish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:finnish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:korean
							any_primary_culture = {
								has_discrimination_trait = heritage_han
							}
						}
					}
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:TPG ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox

					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa

						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:hawaiian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:maori
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:australian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:anglo_canadian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:british
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:irish
							c:NRU ?= this
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:orthodox
					OR = {
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:russian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:byelorussian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:ukrainian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:danish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:swedish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:finnish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:korean
							any_primary_culture = {
								has_discrimination_trait = heritage_han
							}
						}
					}
					c:PAP ?= this
					c:TPG ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_mahayana_monks_RU_IG_PP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_devout
			owner = {
				c:TPG ?= this
				NOR = {
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:ibadi
						NOT = { c:ZAN ?= this }
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:shinto
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:japanese
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:hawaiian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:maori
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:australian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:anglo_canadian
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:british
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:irish
							c:NRU ?= this
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:orthodox
					OR = {
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:russian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:byelorussian
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:ukrainian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:danish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:norwegian
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:swedish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						country_has_primary_culture = cu:finnish
					}
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:korean
							any_primary_culture = {

							}
						}
					}
					c:PAP ?= this
					AND = {
						country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
						OR = {
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:yankee
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:dixie
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:afro_american
							country_has_primary_culture = cu:cherokee
						}
					}
					country_has_state_religion = rel:catholic
					country_has_state_religion = rel:protestant
					country_has_state_religion = rel:sunni
					country_has_state_religion = rel:shiite
					country_has_state_religion = rel:oriental_orthodox
					country_has_state_religion = rel:hindu
					country_has_state_religion = rel:gelugpa
					country_has_state_religion = rel:theravada
					country_has_state_religion = rel:mahayana					
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ig_taiping_god_worshippers_RU_IG_PP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_devout
			owner = {
				AND = {
					country_has_state_religion = rel:ibadi
					NOT = { c:ZAN ?= this }
				}
				NOR = {
					c:TPG ?= this
					AND = {

		}

	}
	text = {
		localization_key = ig_default_RU_PP
		fallback = yes
	}

RU_CL_SJ_RP = {
	type = country
	random_valid = no
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_subject_type = subject_type_puppet
		}
		localization_key = subject_type_puppet_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_subject_type = subject_type_dominion
		}
		localization_key = subject_type_dominion_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_subject_type = subject_type_vassal
		}
		localization_key = subject_type_vassal_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_subject_type = subject_type_tributary
		}
		localization_key = subject_type_tributary_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_subject_type = subject_type_personal_union
		}
		localization_key = subject_type_personal_union_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
		}
		localization_key = subject_type_protectorate_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_subject_type = subject_type_chartered_company
		}
		localization_key = subject_type_chartered_company_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_subject_type = subject_type_colony
		}
		localization_key = subject_type_colony_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_subject_type = subject_type_crown_land
		}
		localization_key = subject_type_crown_land_RP
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = subject_type_DEFAULT_RP
	}
}
### INTEREST GROUP | ЗАИНТЕРЕСОВАННЫЕ ГРУППЫ ###
## ПАДЕЖИ ##
RU_IG_D_RP = {
	type = interest_group
	log_loc_errors = no
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_landowners
		}
		localization_key = ig_landowners_RU_IG_D_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_intelligentsia
		}
		localization_key = ig_intelligentsia_RU_IG_D_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_armed_forces
		}
		localization_key = ig_armed_forces_RU_IG_D_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_industrialists
		}
		localization_key = ig_industrialists_RU_IG_D_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_rural_folk
		}
		localization_key = ig_rural_folk_RU_IG_D_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_devout
		}
		localization_key = ig_devout_RU_IG_D_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_petty_bourgeoisie
		}
		localization_key = ig_petty_bourgeoisie_RU_IG_D_RP
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_interest_group_type = ig_trade_unions
		}
		localization_key = ig_trade_unions_RU_IG_D_RP
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = ig_default_RU_RP
		fallback = yes
	}
}

	}

RU_CL_SJ_PP = {
	type = country
	random_valid = no
	log_loc_errors = no
